chapters.title: Chapter 1: Seeds of Shadow
chapters.info: Sheriam Bayanar, p. 20 (7)—Mistress of Novices in the White Tower; an Aes Sedai of the Blue Ajah. Min has a viewing of her indicating that she will be hurt sometime in the future (although she cannot say when). Sheriam has long been a symbol of the Tower, at least in the eyes of those who come to study there—she keeps a strict but not brutal discipline and makes sure that her students know their place around her. Her study is famous in the Tower, both as a place of sanctuary when the stress of novice (or Accepted) life becomes too great to bear alone and as a place of punishment when an initiate steps out of line.
